resources.string: Wow!, Leave Some Coffee For Others

This is a simple app to make a simple order for coffee, with two flavors options. 
this app will show the total quantity, total price and finally when order button hit, it will show a final report for the whole order. 
This app was made by Hadi Ahmed, using some tutorials to learn and a couple of searching pages and documentations. please contact me if there's any comment. 
E-mail:"h.a7med2017@gmail.com"
